'''Gladiator's Finale''' is an [[Artifact Set]] available at [[:Category:4-Star Artifacts|4-star]] and [[:Category:5-Star Artifacts|5-star]] rarities which can be obtained from [[Bosses]] at [[World Level]] 2 and above.

==Dropped By==
{{Dropped By|boss=all|weekly=all}}

==Gameplay Notes==
*4-Piece Bonus:
**The 4-Piece Bonus is considered [[Damage Bonus]] and is additive with other Damage Bonus sources such as {{Color|Black|Elemental DMG Bonus}}% from a [[Goblet of Eonothem]].
**The 4-Piece Bonus only applies to [[Normal Attack]]s and does not affect other sources of damage such as [[Crescent Pike]]'s Infusion Needle.
